title: teddybear
author: teddybear
content: Here is  the top 10 Cryptos with the highest potential to grow, can you suggest which is the game changer in 2023??1. Ethereum2. Polygon3. Solana4. Cardano5. ApeCoin6. Tron7. Sandbox8. Chainlink9. Shiba Inu10. CosmosIn my wallet majority of the share holding by Solana and ApeCoin does it be a good choice?

comments.author: Kocret02
comments.body: In my opinion, whatever form of Crypto you will choose, you must first study and study the latest price predictions. Only then can you determine for yourself whether the chosen Crypto will be a good investment or not.

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: it's your money so whatever the best comes from you and make sure you do your research before investing in the altcoin list above although I also hold some from your list namely matic polygon, I believe matic polygon will hit the price of $ 5 in the next 2 years

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: If you want the best advice mate, then it is DYOR, that is the first and most important thing to do before any investment whatsoever, after doing your own research, you might not need anybody's advice on what to do or the right steps to take; you should also take into cognizance that most altcoins are short term projects and hodling them for quite a long time might not be the best thing to do. Having said that, Ethereum has been the best altcoin for quite a long time now, with many Eth killers coming and failing, i have to select Ethereum as one of the best altcoins an investor can invest in; and if you are to choose Ethereum, then you don't have to buy any other coins because you think you want to diversify, you are only trying so hard to lose money, if you choose one coin, and you want to diversify, then you look outside of the crypto market for another investment.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: teddybear on September 05, 2022, 06:07:59 PMIn my wallet majority of the share holding by Solana and ApeCoin does it be a good choice?     For now, I'll take more Ethereum if I've got available money to buy.I guess if you're for the profit and you're just waiting for it to come then that two are likely good choices. I don't know much about Apecoin, I only know it as it become the token of those that have made BAYC.Solana was like an Ethereum-like project but I see some flaws on it based on the news that I've read before.

comments.author: flipme
comments.body: I prefer Ethereum. In fact, all other coins are coins that have completed their potential. So I wouldn't tie my money to them. In my opinion, they all have LTC potential. That's why I don't take risks and prefer Ethereum. It's the Bitcoin of Altcoins. Also, if I was too indecisive, maybe I would invest in other coins on the list, but I definitely wouldn't invest in coins like ApeCoin, Tron, and Shiba Inu.

comments.author: okorieemmanuel
comments.body: Quote from: teddybear on September 05, 2022, 06:07:59 PM Here is  the top 10 Cryptos with the highest potential to grow, can you suggest which is the game changer in 2023??1. Ethereum2. Polygon3. Solana4. Cardano5. ApeCoin6. Tron7. Sandbox8. Chainlink9. Shiba Inu10. CosmosIn my wallet majority of the share holding by Solana and ApeCoin does it be a good choice?     According to your list,  ethereum would be the best option. However, if you add Litecoin, I would definitely choose it. Cardano seems to have great prospects in 2023 compared with Solana.

comments.author: minairia3
comments.body: Among the coins you listed, I still think Ethereum is the best choice on your list,  all of them are potential coins that are worth investing in. in the list, I only see Tron as the only coin that shouldn't be invested as it hasn't had any hype for a while, Tron doesn't have any more development if you remove Tron instead on that BNB would be great. In addition, shiba and ape are 2 meme coins you should leave below and limit investing too much in them, prioritizing projects with more utilities.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Good choice of solid altcoins that has the potential of a good return. You can never go wrong with Ethereum. If went below $100 during the bear market in 2018 and look at how it goes up in the bull run in 2020-2021. Same with Cardano as well, it was just worth a cent that time and then suddenly exploded to more than $2.00.So I won't argue with your coins of crypto to hold and buy in this bear market. And I think that's about it, 10 solid coins and no more. Because it you added some, it might complicate things for you. Hopefully you also have BTC in your portfolio, as majority of us here hold mostly like 60% of it and then the rest was spread across solid altcoins that in your list.

comments.author: n0ne
comments.body: Quote from: virasisog on September 05, 2022, 10:12:24 PMAll those coins have good potential but we have different preferences when it comes to choosing. As for me, I would pick Ethereum because next to Bitcoin, it has shown huge potential for years. It has passed lots of tests over time so I believe that there are still lots of promising milestones that it could reach. It has a strong foundation so I trust it over other altcoins. Every altcoin mentioned in the list is really promising and assure with long term profiting. Among the list we've seen good growth with majority of the coins when calculated against price and the ROI. For now Tron is the only coin that is not moving big, but it have got its market capital and stay on the top. A break from tron is being much expected. For now my choice among those mentioned will be ethereum and Cardano.

Shiba and Solana would win in that category based on my observation hehe.Ethereum POS issues would likely be fixed by 2023 if there will be any so it is a safe choice but my dark horse from your list would be Sandbox.

comments.author: autumnleaf
comments.body: Even though Bitcoin is always the greatest and top cryptocurrency to hold for a longer period of time, I'll add Ethereum on my list even though it's always at the top of my list of coins to buy and hold because it has already established its existence, worth, and usage. Although it's still a good idea to keep a variety of altcoins in your wallet, I'll diversify so that 80% of it goes to BTC and ETH and the remaining 20% is split among my chosen altcoins.

comments.author: Smack That Ace
comments.body: Is your list sorted by potential? If that's the case, then ethereum is clearly the most promising altcoin. The upgrade to POS will be a great opportunity for it to break out in the future when the supply will decrease significantly, this upgrade will pave the way for other important upgrades for ethereum in the future. Once the sharding upgrade is updated, there will be expanded, it will have no competitors, ethereum's previous competitors will be left behind. I really believe in the future of ETH. it continues to be our best altcoin.

comments.author: budi691
comments.body: I see all the coins on your list have the potential to go up even more as the bear market has taken them all down, seeing good growth with most of the coins in terms of price and ROI.but for me Ethereum is always at the top of my list of coins to buy and keep because it's here

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: Your lists are the most pretty good token to invest your money with because of their popularity but you still need to understand that the most potential is those who are constantly in their development and updates to increase their sales. Popularity does not matter when the token is no longer updated or developed by its owner or the roadmap is no longer followed. Therefore, doing your own research will boost your chance to land a good project, and also you will have a chance to buy at the right time not when the price is about to fall again.
